topic.title: Editing Attributes In-Place Using Form Controls

body.p: To edit attributes in the Author mode, use the Attributes View.
also includes built-in form controls that can be used in Author mode to edit attribute and element text values. You can also implement custom form controls for your specific needs.

As a working example, the bundled samples project contains a file called personal.xml and, along with its corresponding personal.css file, you can edit attributes in-place or see how it uses some of these default implementations.
